original_text: I judged your fathers in the wilderness when they came out of Egypt. I will punish you in the same way. That is what the Almighty Lord says.
korean_text: 내가 애굽 땅 광야에서 너희 조상들을 심판한 것 같이 너희를 심판하리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I judged your fathers in the wilderness
when they came out of Egypt
I will punish you in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 같은 방식으로 너희를 벌할 것이다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Almighty Lord says
